metadata.title: CVE-2019-14868 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In ksh version 20120801, a flaw was found in the way it evaluates certainenvironment variables. An attacker could use this flaw to override orbypass environment restrictions to execute shell commands. Services andapplications that allow remote unauthenticated attackers to provide one ofthose environment variables could allow them to exploit this issueremotely.

criterions.comment: ksh: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
